---
title: "about"
---

this is a collection of some active tech meetups in the ottawa / gatineau "national capital region" (ncr).

- an **_active meetup_** is a meetup that is running monthly-ish events

- a **_tech meetup_** is a meetup focusing topics such as: software development, programming languages, user experience in technology, research relating to computers, creativity in technology, documentation of technology, the technology industry, hacking/making with technology, etc.
